txt.en: <rgb=#00FF00>The pursuers have been defeated! The surviving citizens find their way to safety.</rgb>
Defend the citizens from the the Corsair raiders.
A number of citizens are pinned by the enemy. We must rescue them or they will surely be lost!
'Help! They're coming for us and there's nowhere to run!'
<rgb=#00FF00>One of the fleeing citizens has fallen!</rgb>
'There ya be! Yer gonners, the lot of ya!'

A group of Pelargir citizens are fleeing from the Corsairs raiders. Now, they've found themselves in a corner with nowhere to run. Protect them until they are safe from their pursuers.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Keep the citizens alive
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the citizens to fall</rgb>
